K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:211b-19: chos la slob dpon dpe mkhyud byed pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:211b-20: chos 'dod rnams la bgegs ni byed gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-2: rgyal bas bsngags pa'i chos ni yong mi ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-3: le lo can te bdag bstod rtag tu brtson //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-4: gzhan la smod par byed la mngon par dga'; ;chos bzhi 'di dag rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-5: shes rab nyams par 'gyur bar rgyal bas gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-6: chos bzhi 'di dag rab tu spangs byas la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-7: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos bzhi gzhan bsgom mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-9: chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-12: chos dang chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa yin /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-14: ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-15: mang du thos pa las shes rab 'byung bar rig nas /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-17: nan tan snying por byed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-18: smra ba dang brjod pa'i tshig lhur len pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-20: chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-21: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-22: chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212a-23: zang zing med cing rnyed dang bkur sti la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212b-0: re ba med cing @212b tshigs bcad mi sems par //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212b-2: thos las shes rab 'byung bar des rig nas //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:212b-28: sems can gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-0: sgyu dang g-yo dang rgyan la @213a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-2: gzhan la brten gyi bsam pas ma yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-3: chos bzhi 'di dag kun du bsten byas na //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-5: de lta bas na chos 'di sten byed na //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-7: de las bzlog pa sten par byed na ni //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-11: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjod par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-15: tha na bzhad gad kyi phyir yang rdzun gyi tshig mi smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-16: sgyu dang g-yo med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-17: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213a-18: de dag gi yang dag pa'i bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213b-4: sgyu dang g-yo ni rtag tu rnam spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213b-5: lhag pa'i bsam pas rtag tu sems can lta //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213b-9: de dag bsngags pa phyogs bzhir rjod par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:213b-10: sems can gang dag yongs su smin byed pa //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214a-14: gnam sa ring bas shin tu ring bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214a-16: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214a-19: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod tshol ba la brtsams nas legs par thos pa tshol gyi nyes par thos pa mi tshol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214a-20: sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa'i sems khyi dang 'dra ba yin /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214b-2: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni mtha' yas shing sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'jug ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214b-4: de bzhin gshegs pas mngon sum mo zhes byas nas mi spang pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214b-6: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan no /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214b-7: khyad par du 'gro bas yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214b-8: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214b-18: rgyal bas mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214b-21: chos 'di dag la rab tu gnas pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:214b-22: rgyal bas bsngags pa'i byang chub rnyed mi dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-1: bzhi po 'di dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-5: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la som nyi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-8: sems can rnams la nga rgyal dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-12: gnod par sems pa dang; gzhan gyi rnyed pa rnams la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-15: brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-17: bzhi po de dag ni gya gyu can gyi sems bskyed pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-19: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-21: sems can rnams la nga rgyal rgyags khro bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-22: gzhan gyi rnyed la ser sna phrag dog byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-23: rgyal ba la ni nam yang dad mi byed; ;mi mkhas rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-24: bsngags pa min dang brjod min mi snyan brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-25: gya gyu can gyi sems bzhi rnam par spang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-26: byang chub sems dpas rtag tu sems can bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215a-28: bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' drang po'i drang ba'i mtshan nyid yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215b-0: ltung ba byung ba rnams mi @215b 'chab cing brjod de rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215b-1: 'chags pas kun nas ldang ba med pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215b-2: de'i bden pa'i tshig gang gis rgyal srid stor ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215b-4: srog gi bar chad du 'gyur yang bden pa'i tshig mi mkhyud cing gzhan nas gzhan du bsgyur ba'i tshig mi smra ba yin /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215b-12: 'ching bar byed pa'i nyes pa thams cad la bdag gi nyes par sems shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215b-13: las kyi rnam par smin pa la ston pas gzhan dag la mi 'khrug cing khong du 'dzin pa med pa yin /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:215b-20: brjod cing rnam par 'byed de nyes pa 'dor //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231a-18: rab tu nyams zhes bshad do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231a-30: mi nad pa zhig yod la /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231a-32: sman lto na 'dug pa de nyid mi 'byung na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231b-2: sman lto na mchis pa nyid ma byung na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231b-3: mi de'i bro nad shin tu tshabs che bar 'gyur lags so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231b-6: de bzhin du lta bar gyur pa thams cad las byung ba ni stong pa nyid yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231b-8: gang stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231b-17: de ni gsor mi rung zhes rgyal bas gsungs //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231b-22: nam mkha' 'di sol cig ces de skad zer na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231b-25: nam mkha' de bsal bar nus sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:231b-28: de ni rngo mi thogs lags so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:232a-3: dper na nam mkhas 'jigs pa nyen pa'i mi //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:232a-5: nam mkha' bsal bar nus pa ma yin yang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:232b-23: de bzhin shes rab dbang po skyes nas kyang //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233a-10: byang phyogs su yang 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233a-13: snyam du mi sems mod kyi /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233a-16: de la ye shes gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233a-17: mi shes pa gnag yin pa de gnyi ga stong pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233a-18: gzung du med cing byed pa med do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233a-33: khang phran lo 'bum 'das par sus kyang lan 'ga' yang mar me ma bus pa der mi la la zhig gis mar me bus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-0: mun pa mun nag de 'di snyam du bdag @233b ni lo 'bum du bsags pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-1: bdag 'di nas ma 'gro'o snyam du sems sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-4: de ni mi sems lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-5: mar me bus na mun pa mun nag la mi mchi ba'i mthu ma mchis kyi /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-11: mar me zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-13: mun pa mun nag ces bya ba de ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-14: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-15: dper na khyim du mi 'ga' la la yis //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-17: de la mun pa bdag gnas ring lon gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-18: 'di nas mi 'gro snyam du sems pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-19: mar me phyung nas mun pa mun nag la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-20: med par mi 'gyur pa yi nus med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-21: mar me bstan nas mun pa med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-22: gnyi ga stong pa rlom sems ci yang med //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-24: mi shes nyon mongs bsags pa med par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-25: ye shes dang ni nyon mongs rtag par yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-26: de dag lan 'ga' tsam yang 'grogs pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:233b-27: ye shes mi shes mi bya mi sems kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:234a-2: gnyis ka gzung med nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:234a-3: de bzhin ye shes mi shes gnyis ka stong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:234a-6: dper na; nam mkha' la ni sa bon rnams mi skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:234a-8: de bzhin du gang 'dus ma byas las byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye ba ni ma byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:234a-10: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-11: stobs kyi shugs yang dag par byung bas bar shag shig med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-12: byang chub kyi yan lag gis 'gro ba rnam par dag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-13: gcugs can dgra nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi lam 'dor bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-15: pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-16: mu stegs can ngan pa'i mu stegs 'dor bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-17: zhi gnas kyis nges par sems pa brtan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-19: mtha' gnyis la ma chags par 'jugs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-20: rgyu'i chos dang yang dag par ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-21: sgra grags pa yangs shing rgya che la mi zad cing tshad med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257a-23: dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-0: @257b 'jig tshogs la lta ba 'dor bar zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-1: tshu rol gyi 'gram nas pha rol gyi 'gram du lta ba thams cad sel ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-2: gtse ba med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par myur du song zhig ces phyogs bcur sgras go bar byed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-4: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yid yongs su mi skyo bar byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos kyi gru chen po 'di 'dra ba de sbyar bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-5: dam pa'i chos kyi gru 'dis chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-7: de la 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon pa shes pa myur ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-8: gang 'di sems can thams cad las bcos ma ma yin pa'i sbyor ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-9: bsam pa dag pas rab tu 'dun pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-11: tshul bzhin yid la byed pas dge ba la 'dun pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-12: shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thos pas mi ngoms pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-13: ye shes brtan par bya ba'i phyir nga rgyal med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-14: yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-15: rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-16: lus dang sems dben par dgon pa na gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-17: skye bo mi srun pa rnam par spangs pas 'du 'dzi med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:257b-18: don dam pa la rton pas chos don du gnyer ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-2: ye shes kyi don yin pas chos kyi don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-3: mi 'khrugs pas bden pa'i don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-4: yang dag par sbyor bar byas pas stong pa nyid kyi don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-5: shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i don yin pas dben pa'i don te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-7: 'di ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa myur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-9: 'di ltar dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-10: rigs kyi bu mo rnams la phan 'dogs par gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-16: dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam bstan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-17: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam bskyed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-18: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258a-21: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams @258b la sbyin pa byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i gtsug lag khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed brtsigs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dag la bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-4: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa gzhan zhig gis dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung mnos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-5: lung mnos nas kyang mi spong na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-6: bud med gang zhig lung 'bog na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-7: de nam yang log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te; de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-8: sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-11: yi ger bris nas glegs bam du byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:258b-12: bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-0: su zhig chos smra ba las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'am 'dzin pa'am yi ger 'dri ba de la @259a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar bya ba de bzhin du gus par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-4: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos smra ba la bkur stir byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-7: mchod pa byed pa de la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-8: nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-9: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas kyang lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-13: tshor bas sems kun du ma zin par 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-14: de mig 'khrul par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-15: lag pa g-yo bar mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-16: rkang pa 'phra bar mi byed pa dang; gcin mi stor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-18: de'i snying gar rdul mi 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-20: nam mkha' la mi snyegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-21: ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-22: lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-23: ngag gi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259a-24: bcu gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-0: slar bzlog pa ma yin pa'i tshig @259b dang; gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-2: lha dang mis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-3: sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-4: ngag gi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-5: yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-12: nyes pa la mi dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-13: 'khon gcugs la mi dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-14: 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-15: spong ba la bag yod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-16: ma zhugs pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-17: nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal med par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-18: yid kyi las yongs su dag pa bcu po de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-19: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-20: tshor bas nyen cing 'chi ba'i dus mi byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-21: de yi mig la 'khrul par 'gyur ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-22: lag pa mi g-yo ba rkang pa 'phra mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-23: de ni bshang gci stor bar yong mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-24: de yi snying gar rdul yang 'byung mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-25: khu tshur mi 'chad nam mkha' snyegs mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-26: 'dug bzhin bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-27: lus las yongs su dag pa 'di bcu thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:259b-28: gdangs snyan phun sum tshogs la 'jam mnyen tshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-1: zhing yid 'ong de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-2: gzhan gyis slar mi bzlog cing bzung 'os tshig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-3: skye bos btsun par bya ba'i tshig tu 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-4: de yi tshig ni lha dang klu dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-5: mi'am ci dang de bzhin rgyal bas bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-6: des bshad pa yi don kyang 'dzin byed de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-7: des ni ngag las dag pa de dag 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-8: khro ba med cing 'khon du 'dzin pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-9: brtan pa 'chab pa med cing 'tshig pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-10: nyes la mi dga' 'khon gcugs dga' ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-11: de yi 'du shes phyin ci log mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-12: bslab pa yang dag blangs la sems mi zhum //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-13: spong ba la ni bag med mi 'gyur te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-14: zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis zhing sbyong byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-15: nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal yongs spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-16: ting 'dzin 'byor pa thams cad mngon bsgrubs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-17: yid kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i chos rnams 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-18: chos rnams 'di dag ldan par gyur pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-19: sangs rgyas dngos po dkon par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-20: 'od srung; gang la la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis nga la bkur stir byed par 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260a-21: mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod pa des dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-0: de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par @260b rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-8: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-10: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-11: 'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-12: 'dus pa bzhi bcu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-13: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-15: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-008:260b-16: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o //
